data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Dragon Kin (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This token pack contains 48 tokens based off 12 base stances. Perfect as PC's NPC's or enemies. 12 Green Dragon Kin, 12 Red Dragon Kin, 25 Golden Dragon Kin

This token pack includes:

  • 6 Dragonkin Spears
  • 7 Dragonkin Magic Users
  • 2 Dragonkin Crossbows
  • 7 Dragonkin Axes
  • 4 Dragonkin Swords
  • 4 Dragonkin Hammers
  • 4 Dragonkin Longbow Archer2
  • 2 Dragonkin Daggers
  • 3 Dragonkin Dual Swords
  • 2 Dragonkin Maces
  • 2 Dragonkin Dual Axes
  • 2 Dragonkin Greatswords
  • 2 Dragonkin Wands
  • 2 Dragonkin Scimitars
  • Dragonkin Staff

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license. This product should work with all rulesets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
